text: aur (ai eemaanadaaron) jab tumhaare ladake hade buloog ko pahunchen to jis tarah un ke kabl (badee umr) vaale (ghar mein aane kee) ijaazat le liya karate the usee tarah ye log bhee ijaazat le liya karen-yoon khuda apane ehakaam saaph saaph bayaan karata hai aur khuda to bada vaakiphakaar hakeem hai
